resources.string: Bellow Fellows is a men\'s community choir based in Angel, London that meets on a Tuesday evening.
Drop-in to any Bellow Fellow\'s session and try it out.

Current choir subscriptions are: 
£70(£50 conc) for a term
(usually ~ 10 sessions)
 £12 (£8 conc) drop-in
45 White Lion Street, Angel, London. N1 9PW
